name: Hunter's Guild
description:
Basic Controls - English

While in the Guild:

A/D - Change select object to interac 

Space - Interact/Confirm

Esc - Cancel

While in Level:

WASD - Move character

Move Mouse - Control Camera

Mouse Left Click - Shoot

Space - Jump

Controles Básicos - Portugues

Enquanto na Guild:

A/D - Troca objeto selecionado para interagir

Espaço - Interagir/Confirmar

Esc - Cancelar

Enquanto na Fase:

WASD - Move Character

Movimento Mouse - Controlar Camera

Mouse Clique Esquerdo - Atirar

Espaço - Pular
